<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Positioning Assault](/Feats.aspx?ID=393) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 149 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are wielding a two-handed melee weapon and your target is within your reach.

</column>

---

With punishing blows, you force your opponent into position. Make a Strike with the required weapon. If you hit, you move the target 5 feet into a space in your reach. This follows the [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) rules.
